column4: Hi hi.  I am trying to install phpmyadmin and I get this error: "php5-mcrypt: Depends: libltdl7 (>= 2.2.4) but it is not installable
Hi all.  I am trying to install phpmyadmin and I get this error: "php5-mcrypt: Depends: libltdl7 (>= 2.2.4) but it is not installable" Any ideas?
first step: sudo aptitude update  - to get the database up to date
